item.title: 美国计划提名财政部丹-卡茨为国际货币基金组织二号官员
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府计划提名财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的幕僚长丹-卡茨（Dan Katz）担任国际货币基金组织的二号官员。【原文：President Donald Trump’s administration plans to nominate Dan Katz, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s chief of staff, to be the International Monetary Fund’s No. 2 official, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大央行将利率下调至 2.5%，在风险中 "谨慎 "前行
item.description: 由于美国关税对经济和劳动力市场造成了损害，加拿大央行下调了利率，但对未来货币宽松政策的路径保持缄默。【原文：The Bank of Canada cut interest rates as the economy and labor market show damage from US tariffs, but kept tight-lipped on any future path for monetary easing.】

item.title: 交易员暂停股市反弹，等待美联储重要决定
item.description: 周三早盘，美国股市走势徘徊，华尔街在美联储今天下午降息的预期基本达成之前保持不动。【原文：US equities meandered early Wednesday as Wall Street stayed put ahead ahead of a largely-expected Federal Reserve interest rate cut this afternoon.】

item.title: 纽约高管抨击州政府人才流失和监管 "黑洞
item.description: 希瑟-布里切蒂-穆里根（Heather Briccetti Mulligan）在最近一次与纽约高管的圆桌会议上回忆了一位商人的挫败感，他将申请一个价值 2 亿美元的建筑项目的许可证与订购比萨饼相提并论。【原文：At a recent roundtable with New York executives, Heather Briccetti Mulligan remembers the frustration of a businessman who compared trying to file a permit for a $200 million construction project with ordering a pizza.】

item.title: 美国黄油过剩导致价格跌至三年低点
item.description: 过去几年，随着美国人对黄油的胃口越来越大，乳制品行业转而饲养产奶量更高的奶牛，并扩建设施以满足需求。他们可能做得太过分了。【原文：As America’s appetite for butter grew over the past few years, the dairy industry turned to cows that produce fattier milk and expanded facilities to meet the demand. They might have gone too far.】

item.title: 预期美联储降息前国债收益率接近一周低点
item.description: 随着投资者对周三美联储利率决定的倒计时，国债收益率维持在本周最低水平附近。【原文：Treasury yields held near their lowest levels this week as investors counted down to Wednesday’s Federal Reserve interest-rate decision, which is expected to be the first cut in 2025.】

item.title: 据说布鲁克菲尔德的 Rockpoint Gas Storage 将考虑在多伦多上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）的北美天然气存储平台 Rockpoint Gas Storage 正在考虑在加拿大进行首次公开募股。【原文：Rockpoint Gas Storage, Brookfield Asset Management’s North American natural gas storage platform, is weighing an initial public offering in Canada, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Braskem Idesa 与拉扎德合作，交易商质疑斯利姆的实力
item.description: 由于投资者认为拉美首富出手拯救这家陷入困境的石化生产商并避免债务重组的可能性较小，Braskem-Idesa SAPI 公司的债券在新兴市场上出现了一些最严重的损失。【原文：Bonds from Braskem-Idesa SAPI are posting some of the worst losses in emerging markets as investors price a smaller chance that Latin America’s richest man will step in to rescue the beleaguered petrochemical producer and avoid a debt restructuring.】

item.title: 亚马逊为受贸易战影响的网络卖家改造人工智能代理
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）对其面向在线商家的人工智能代理进行了改造，这一升级可以帮助卖家在中美贸易战阴云密布的假日购物季中游刃有余。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has revamped its artificial intelligence agent for online merchants, an upgrade that could help sellers navigate a holiday shopping season clouded by the trade war between the US and China.】

item.title: Lyft 和 Waymo 将于 2026 年在纳什维尔提供无人驾驶服务
item.description: Lyft 公司首次与 Waymo 合作，从明年起在纳什维尔提供机器人出租车服务，这项交易有助于该公司更好地与竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. is partnering with Waymo for the first time to offer robotaxi service in Nashville starting next year, a deal that helps it better compete with rival Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 致力于让渡渡鸟回归的初创公司融资 1.2 亿美元
item.description: Colossal Biosciences Inc.是一家致力于复活已灭绝动物的生物技术初创公司，该公司已从包括电影制片人彼得-杰克逊在内的投资者那里筹集了1.2亿美元；公司首席执行官表示，公司有望在不到七年的时间里复活渡渡鸟。【原文：Colossal Biosciences Inc., a biotechnology startup working to resurrect extinct animals, has raised $120 million from investors including filmmaker Peter Jackson — and its chief executive officer says the company expects to resurrect the dodo in less than seven years.】

item.title: Stripe 大获稳定币，加密货币权力斗争火花四溅
item.description: 在加密货币发展最快的平台之一上，一场稳定币竞购战预示着该行业的下一阶段，以及谁可能控制它。【原文：A stablecoin bidding war on one of crypto’s fastest-growing platforms is offering a preview of the industry’s next phase — and who might control it.】

item.title: 糖价下跌，因预期巴西产量将增加库存
item.description: 原糖在纽约下跌，原因是头号种植国巴西的供应量将增加，以及对中国和印度尼西亚需求的担忧。【原文：Raw sugar declined in New York on the outlook for bigger supplies from top grower Brazil and concerns about demand in China and Indonesia.】

item.title: Momentum 考虑为其与印度亿万富翁贝拉的合资企业进行首次公开募股
item.description: Momentum Group Ltd. 愿意考虑为其与亿万富翁 Kumar Mangalam Birla 成立的印度合资公司进行首次公开募股，因为这家南非保险公司正在加快其在亚洲第三大经济体的扩张计划。【原文：Momentum Group Ltd. is open to considering an initial public offering for its Indian venture with billionaire Kumar Mangalam Birla as the South African insurer steps up its expansion plans in Asia’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 美国新屋开工数降至 5 月以来最低点，总体呈下降趋势
item.description: 美国上个月的房屋开工率降至 5 月份以来的最低点，原因是房屋库存过多，减缓了建筑商提高产量的热情。【原文：Housing starts in the US fell last month to the lowest since May, as bloated home inventory slowed builders’ appetites to boost production.】

item.title: 波罗的海原油出口受阻，俄罗斯原油出口势头减弱
item.description:

。【原文：

item.title: 立思辰以 16 亿美元收购业主派拉蒙集团
item.description: Rithm Capital Corp. 同意以约 16 亿美元的价格收购纽约和旧金山的写字楼业主派拉蒙集团公司（Paramount Group Inc.【原文：Rithm Capital Corp. agreed to buy Paramount Group Inc., an office landlord in New York and San Francisco, for about $1.6 billion.】

item.title: 诺基亚聘请英特尔高管领导进军人工智能数据中心
item.description: 作为新任首席执行官贾斯汀-霍塔德（Justin Hotard）战略转变的一部分，诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）成立了一个新的人工智能部门，并聘请英特尔公司（Intel Corp.【原文：Nokia Oyj has created a new artificial intelligence department and hired a former Intel Corp. executive to lead a push into the technology, as part of a strategic shift under new Chief Executive Officer Justin Hotard.】

item.title: Keensight 以 10 亿美元收购 Isto 大部分股权
item.description: 欧洲私募股权公司Keensight Capital同意从Thompson Street Capital Partners手中收购整形生物产品制造商Isto Biologics的多数股权，中型交易继续回升。【原文：European private equity firm Keensight Capital agreed to acquire a majority stake in orthobiologic product maker Isto Biologics from Thompson Street Capital Partners, as the pickup in mid-sized deals continues.】

item.title: 俄罗斯与小麦贸易商举行会谈以促进疲软的出口
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，俄罗斯官员已与该国主要谷物贸易商举行会谈，力争在本季小麦收获季开始后提振世界头号小麦发货国的出口。【原文：Russian officials have held talks with the country’s major grain traders in an effort to boost exports from the world’s top wheat shipper after a sluggish start to the season, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行副行长称美元辩论时机已到
item.description: 津巴布韦央行副行长表示，津巴布韦人应更多地关注他们的黄金支持货币，该货币将于 2030 年成为唯一的法定货币，而不是如何逐步淘汰美元的使用。【原文：Zimbabweans should focus more on their gold-backed currency that’s set to become the sole legal tender by 2030 and less on how to phase out dollar use, according to the central bank’s deputy governor.】

item.title: Seqens 债权人求助于 Paul Weiss，因为现金达到 "临界点
item.description: Seqens SASU 的一组债权人已经聘请了一名法律顾问，因为人们越来越担心这家法国制药公司可能会出现资金紧张。【原文：A group of creditors to Seqens SASU has tapped a legal adviser amid growing concerns over a potential cash crunch at the French pharmaceuticals firm.】

item.title: 银行为贝恩收购 HSO 筹借约 6 亿欧元债务
item.description: 银行家们已经为贝恩资本（Bain Capital）收购荷兰技术服务公司 HSO 排定了约 6 亿欧元（约合 7.1 亿美元）的债务融资。【原文：Bankers have lined up around €600 million ($710 million) of debt financing to back Bain Capital’s acquisition of Dutch technology services company HSO.】

item.title: 三色公司涉嫌欺诈后破产，汽车贷款公司资产争夺战一触即发
item.description: 次级汽车贷款公司 Tricolor Holdings 突然倒闭后，美国各地的债权人争先恐后地对该公司的剩余资产提出索赔，以控制损失。【原文：In the wake of the sudden collapse of subprime auto lender Tricolor Holdings, creditors across the US are scrambling to stake their claim on the company’s remaining assets and contain their losses.】

item.title: 海湾航空公司聘请被解职的波罗的海航空公司总裁马丁-高斯担任首席执行官
item.description: 巴林国家航空公司海湾航空公司（Gulf Air）任命马丁-高斯（Martin Gauss）为首席执行官，而这距离他被波罗的海航空公司（Air Baltic）解雇仅几个月。【原文：Bahrain’s national carrier Gulf Air named Martin Gauss its chief executive officer just months after he was fired from the same position at Air Baltic.】

item.title: 欧盟结束与印尼的贸易协议，努力开拓新市场
item.description: 作为欧盟努力实现供应链多样化和开拓新市场的一部分，欧盟和印度尼西亚在近十年后结束了贸易谈判。【原文：The European Union and Indonesia have concluded trade talks after nearly a decade as part of the bloc’s efforts to diversify its supply chains and open new markets.】

item.title: 20 亿美元赎回后南非考虑发行新欧洲债券
item.description: 南非国库表示，在偿还了本周到期的 20 亿美元债券后，正在考虑利用欧洲债券市场补充现金储备。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury said it’s considering tapping the Eurobond market to replenish cash reserves after it repaid a $2 billion bond that matured this week.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 XRG 集团放弃 190 亿美元的桑托斯竞标
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. walked away from a proposed $19 billion offer for Australian natural gas producer Santos Ltd., saying a “combination of factors” discouraged it from making a final bid.】

item.description:
泄漏的油井和有毒的水正在威胁着全球石油市场的基石--二叠纪盆地。【原文：

Leaking wells and toxic water are threatening the Permian basin, a cornerstone of global oil markets.

item.title: 即将上任的欧洲央行利率制定者佩雷拉说他 "绝对 "不是 "鸽派
item.description: 即将上任的理事会成员阿尔瓦罗-桑托斯-佩雷拉（Alvaro Santos Pereira）自称 "绝对不是一只鸽子"，他认为欧洲中央银行很可能在未来几个月内保持利率稳定。【原文：The European Central Bank is likely to maintain steady interest rates in the months ahead, according to incoming Governing Council member Alvaro Santos Pereira, who described himself as “definitely not a dove.”】
